subject: Attention
body:
Attention
We are writing this message to you from the United Nations Center to
inform you that you have been chosen as our Representative in your
city / community to distribute the total sum of $5,000,000 US Dollars
for Global Human Relief empowerment in order to help the poor people
in your city. Such as the Disabled people, The homeless, Orphanages,
schools, and General Hospitals. If you receive the message, reply  For
more information about the Palliative Care payment.
Regards.
Management
Mr. W. Harrison
mrwharrison82@gmail.com
United Nations General Assembly (UNGA)
Address: 760 United Nations Plaza, Manhattan,
New York City, New York (10017-6818),
United States

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Dear Mr. W. Harrison,

I am honored to have been chosen for such a noble task. I am ready and willing to assist in any way possible to help the less fortunate in my community.

Could you please provide more details about the process, how the funds will be distributed, and what my responsibilities will be?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Paul
